entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
